content.title: Brief Bio of Jean Janes
content.heading: Meet Jean Janes
Spouse
Children
Very Brief Testimony
content.p: Raised Catholic (Catholic schools,...), first studied the Bible at Bible Study Fellowship at age 49; accepted Christ at age 49.
content.heading: Favorite Book of the Bible and Why
content.p: Genesis. The book I was reading and studying when I accepted Christ as my Lord and Savior.
content.heading: Favorite Verse and Why
content.p: John 4:13-14 because it comes from the woman at the well story and gives the answer to the problems of the present life as well as the promise of eternal life.
content.heading: Favorite Book (besides the Bible) and Why
content.p: "My Utmost for His Highest" by Oswald Chambers, because it causes me to think about my relationship with God on a different, deeper level.
content.heading: Who do you most admire (besides Jesus)
content.p: My sister and her husband -- have been living out the committed Christian life together for a long time.
content.heading: What do you do at Calvary
content.p: Events Center Ministry, Young Disciples Club 2nd grade teacher, Women's Ministry Bible study small group leader, Women-Helping-Women Ministry, Secretary.
